title: 2 arrested with firearms at Jatrabari
body: Detective Branch of the Dhaka Metropolitan Police have arrested two individuals with firearms from Dholaipar area in the capitalâ€™s Jatrabari area. The arrested were Milon Hossain, 39, and Shamil Hossain, 22, said a press release issued on Saturday. According to the police officials, detectives stationed near Sayedabad bus stand had received information on Friday afternoon, that several armed persons were gathering in the area. Acting on that information, a team of Detective Branch officials from Wari division conducted a drive at about 4:30pm on Friday near the Tungipara bus counter adjacent to the Dholaipar roundabout under Jatrabari police station. The duo attempted to flee the scene on a motorcycle after sensing police presence, the police said, adding that the police, however, were able to arrest them. After searching their bodies, police recovered two foreign-made pistols, hidden at the back of their waists and seized the motorcycle used by them. The police said that legal action against the arrested was under way.
